home_hero_title: Fullstack web developer, web designer and young entrepreneur
home_hero_subtitle: I am KesvaL, or Jordan in real life, a French fullstack web developer. I founded {brand} to help entrepreneurs develop their online presence.
home_about_description: I am a fullstack web developer passionate about creating websites and web applications. I have gained solid experience in front-end and back-end development, as well as web design. My goal is to help you realize your ideas online.
home_about_experience_description: I have been a developer by passion for over 10 years, and since 2022, I have been creating websites and web applications for my clients.
home_about_projects_description: I have completed many projects, ranging from simple showcase sites to large-scale applications and online stores.
home_about_clients_description: I am proud to have helped my clients achieve their goals, and I hope to support them as best I can in their future projects.
about_hero_subtitle: Young entrepreneur passionate about IT and science, I am a French fullstack web developer. Today, I am looking to expand my expertise in order to help as many people as possible in their projects. When I am not coding, you will find me practicing powerlifting - very far from IT!
about_resume_about_description: I am a passionate fullstack developer. I started when I was 8 years old, writing my first lines of code in Java, creating Minecraft mods. I then evolved into web development and now work with the latest technologies, such as Svelte, Bun and TypeScript. In the future, I want to create applications for everyone that simplify life.
about_resume_education_description: I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Mathematics, and I am currently studying at the University of Mulhouse, in Multimedia and Internet, where I am learning web development, communication, 3D, video and audio. I am in my second year and I am currently specializing in web development.
contact_hero_subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I am here to listen to you and advise you, for free!
contact_hero_get_in_touch_description: Feel free to contact me through my social networks or by email. I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
contact_hero_availability_description: I am available for freelance projects and collaborations. I usually respond within 24 hours.
contact_hero_looking_for_work: Are you looking for a developer?
contact_hero_looking_for_work_descriptio: I'm always interested in new opportunities. Let me know if you think I can help!
experience_olwe_description: Fullstack developer, mainly on web applications using React with Next for the front-end and Express with MariaDB on the back-end.
experience_kesval_description: I work as a fullstack web developer, on sites using CMS or on web applications using modern technologies.
experience_ciotadin_office_description: Assistant and receptionist in a general purpose computer repair shop.
experience_uha_description: I am a computer science student at the University of Haute-Alsace, where I am acquiring skills in web and mobile development, as well as in project management in BUT MMI.
experience_theodore_deck_description: I obtained my baccalaureate with honors in maths and computer science at Lycée Théodore Deck in Guebwiller.
footer_cta: Do you have a project in mind?
footer_cta_desc: Do you have a project in mind?
footer_cta_secondary_desc: I am here to listen to you and advise you, free of charge!
